Metadata.Title: Unused Administrative Interfaces Are Disabled
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that unused administrative interfaces are disabled when configuring your network devices for security.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
